GSD.product_version: versions from v4.9 to before v5.10.150
GSD.description:
tty: serial: fsl_lpuart: disable dma rx/tx use flags in lpuart_dma_shutdown

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.150 by commit 9a56ade124d4891a31ab1300c57665f07f5b24d5, it was introduced in version v4.9 by commit 6250cc30c4c4e25393ba247f71bdc04b6af3191b. For more details please see the references link.
